languages.text: Wounds are a measurement of how much punishment a character can take before suffering debilitating effects and ultimately, death. Every character has a specified number of wounds. A character can often increase their wounds by spending {g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}experience points{/g} and improving their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}, such as {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, or gaining new {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.
languages.original_text: Здоровье персонажа — показатель того, сколь многое он может вынести, прежде чем ощутит угасание жизни и последующую смерть. Увеличить запас здоровья можно при повышении уровня персонажа, улучшая {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливость{/g} или осваивая новые {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}таланты{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wounds are a measurement of how much punishment a character can take before suffering debilitating effects and ultimately, death. Every character has a specified number of wounds. A character can often increase their wounds by spending experience points and improving their characteristics, such as {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, or gaining new talents and abilities.

Wounds are a measurement of how much punishment a character can take before suffering debilitating effects and ultimately, death. Every character has a specified number of wounds. A character can often increase their wounds by spending {g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}experience points{/g} and improving their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}, such as {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, or gaining new {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.

Wounds are a measurement of how much punishment a character can take before suffering debilitating effects and ultimately, death. Every character has a specified number of wounds. A character can often increase their wounds by spending {g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}experience points{/g} and improving their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}, such as {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, or gaining new {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.

languages.text: Здоровье персонажа — показатель того, сколь многое он может вынести, прежде чем ощутит угасание жизни и последующую смерть. Увеличить запас здоровья можно при повышении уровня персонажа, улучшая {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливость{/g} или осваивая новые {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}таланты{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g}.
languages.original_text: Wounds are a measurement of how much punishment a character can take before suffering debilitating effects and ultimately, death. Every character has specified number of Wounds. A character can often increase their Wounds by spending experience points and improving their characteristics (as {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}) or gaining new talents and features.

traits.locale_text: Здоровье персонажа — показатель того, сколь многое он может вынести, прежде чем ощутит угасание жизни и последующую смерть. Увеличить запас здоровья можно при повышении уровня персонажа, улучшая {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливость{/g} или осваивая новые таланты и способности.

Здоровье персонажа — показатель того, сколь многое он может вынести, прежде чем ощутит угасание жизни и последующую смерть. Увеличить запас здоровья можно при повышении уровня персонажа, улучшая {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливость{/g} или осваивая новые таланты и способности.

languages.text: Wunden sind ein Maß dafür, wie viel Schaden ein Charakter einstecken kann, bevor er schwächende Auswirkungen und schließlich den Tod erleidet. Jeder Charakter hat eine bestimmte Anzahl von Wunden. Ein Charakter kann seine Wunden oft erhöhen, indem er {g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}Erfahrungspunkte{/g} investiert und seine {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g} wie {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} verbessert oder neue {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talente{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} erwirbt.
languages.original_text: Wounds are a measurement of how much punishment a character can take before suffering debilitating effects and ultimately, death. Every character has a specified number of wounds. A character can often increase their wounds by spending {g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}experience points{/g} and improving their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}, such as {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, or gaining new {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} sind ein Maß dafür, wie viel Schaden ein Charakter einstecken kann, bevor er schwächende Auswirkungen und schließlich den Tod erleidet. Jeder Charakter hat eine bestimmte Anzahl von Wunden. Ein Charakter kann seine Wunden oft erhöhen, indem er {g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}Erfahrungspunkte{/g} ausgibt und seine Eigenschaften verbessert, wie {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}, oder neue {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talente{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} erwirbt.

languages.text: Le paramètre Blessures mesure la capacité d'un personnage à encaisser des coups avant de souffrir d'effets débilitants, puis de mourir. Chaque personnage dispose d'un nombre déterminé de blessures. En général, un personnage augmente sa réserve de blessures en dépensant des {g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}points d'expérience{/g} et en améliorant différentes {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g}, comme l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}, ou en acquérant de nouveaux {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g}.
languages.original_text: Wounds are a measurement of how much punishment a character can take before suffering debilitating effects and ultimately, death. Every character has a specified number of wounds. A character can often increase their wounds by spending {g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}experience points{/g} and improving their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}, such as {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, or gaining new {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Le paramètre {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Blessures{/g} mesure l'intensité du châtiment qu'un personnage peut supporter avant de souffrir d'effets débilitants, puis de mourir. Chaque personnage dispose d'une réserve dotée d'un nombre déterminé de blessures. En général, un personnage augmente sa réserve de blessures en dépensant des {g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}points d'expérience{/g} et en améliorant ses caractéristiques, telles que la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Résistance{/g}, ou en acquérant de nouveaux {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} et de nouvelles {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g}.

languages.text: 生命值代表角色在死亡之前可以承受多少点伤害，会随着角色受伤而不断下降。每名角色都有各自的生命值。通常情况下，角色可以通过消耗{g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}经验{/g}来提高相关{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}（如{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}），或学习新的{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}来提高生命值。
languages.original_text: Wounds are a measurement of how much punishment a character can take before suffering debilitating effects and ultimately, death. Every character has a specified number of wounds. A character can often increase their wounds by spending {g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}experience points{/g} and improving their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}, such as {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, or gaining new {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}代表角色在死亡之前可以承受多少点伤害，会随着角色受伤而不断下降。每名角色都有各自的生命值。通常情况下，角色可以通过消耗{g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}经验{/g}来提高相关属性（如{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}），或学习新的{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}来提高生命值。

languages.original_text: Wounds are a measurement of how much punishment a character can take before suffering debilitating effects and ultimately, death. Every character has a specified number of wounds. A character can often increase their wounds by spending experience points and improving their characteristics, such as {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, or gaining new talents and abilities.

languages.text: Las heridas muestran cuánto daño puede recibir un personaje antes de recibir efectos debilitantes y, finalmente, morir. Todos los personajes tienen un número concreto de heridas. Los personajes pueden aumentar sus heridas usando {g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}puntos de experiencia{/g} para mejorar sus {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g}, como la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}, o para adquirir nuevos {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talentos{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g}.
languages.original_text: Wounds are a measurement of how much punishment a character can take before suffering debilitating effects and ultimately, death. Every character has a specified number of wounds. A character can often increase their wounds by spending {g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}experience points{/g} and improving their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}, such as {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, or gaining new {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} muestran cuánto daño puede recibir un personaje antes de recibir efectos debilitantes y, finalmente, morir. Todos los personajes tienen un número concreto de heridas. Los personajes pueden aumentar sus heridas usando {g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}puntos de experiencia{/g} para mejorar sus características, como la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}, o para adquirir nuevos {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talentos{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g}.

languages.text: 負傷耐性はキャラクターが弱体化効果により最終的に死亡するまでに耐えられる罰の程度を示す。各キャラクターに特有の負傷耐性がある。キャラクターは{g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}経験値{/g}を消費したり、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}などの{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}を高めたり、新たな{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}タレント{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を習得することで負傷耐性を増加することができる。
languages.original_text: Wounds are a measurement of how much punishment a character can take before suffering debilitating effects and ultimately, death. Every character has a specified number of wounds. A character can often increase their wounds by spending {g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}experience points{/g} and improving their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}, such as {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, or gaining new {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}負傷耐性{/g}はキャラクターが弱体化効果により最終的に死亡するまでに耐えられる罰の程度を示す。各キャラクターに特有の負傷耐性がある。キャラクターは{g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}経験値{/g}を消費したり、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}などの能力を高めたり、新たな{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}タレント{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を習得することで負傷耐性を増加することができる。
